name: iCoderz Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
description:
iCoderz is Full stack mobile apps Development company,  inaugurated its operations in the year 2009 with a few young and dynamic techno- entrepreneurs with an aim of offering customized mobile application development for diverse business industries and categories on various operating systems.
In the present day, the company is on a verge of becoming one of the pioneers in the mobile app development domain. Within five years, we have achieved have expanded our business in terms of infrastructure and staff members. We have extended our service offering by including full-spectrum website design and development solutions.
Why Choose iCoderz : 
Proven Records: "Top Rated" badge  & 95% Job Success Rate. 
Extensive Experience: 400+ Apps Developed. 
Client Interrelation: 70% of Repeat Client. 
Positive Feedback: 4.9/5.0 Feedback . 
Best in Support: Provide Free Support Till Two Month of Project Sign-off.
Easy and Hassle Free Process to Start A Project : 
Sign NDA: To Protect your idea ready to sign Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA).
Requirement Analysis: 
Design: UI/UX Design & Unlimited Revisions. 
Development: Development with Unit Testing will done in this step. 
Release: We will help to upload app on App store Or Play store. 
Support: We will continuously provide support for maintenance & bug fixing
